box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client establishes or
reestablishes connection

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 190px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client sends the source file path
(acknowledged by the server if it has not been
corrupted), the upcoming fragment count, and
the data itself; the server either acknowledges
it or requests for retransmission using
Stop and Wait ARQ

switch.text: The client sends the source file path...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 415px; margin-left: 400px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client requests for dynamic
change of the maximum fragment size,
the server acknowledges it

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 475px; margin-left: 400px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client sends keep-alive messages
that must be acknowledged by the
server for connection persistency

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 545px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client received no keep-alive
acknowledgement within the set period and
sent a timeout message to let the server know
about it

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 625px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client requests for role switch, the
server automatically acknowledges it

switch.text: The client requests for role switch, t...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 690px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The server requests for role switch, the
client does or does not acknowledge the
request based on the user's choice

switch.text: The server requests for role switch, the...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 775px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client requests for connection termination,
the server acknowledges it and terminates the
session

switch.text: The client requests for connection terminatio...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 536px; margin-left: 150px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 158px; margin-left: 150px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 325px; margin-left: 405px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The client sends the upcoming fragment count
(acknowledged by the server if it has not been
corrupted) and a text message itself; the server
either acknowledges it or requests for
retransmission using Stop and Wait ARQ

switch.text: The client sends the upcoming fragment count...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
